website_summaries.verdict: Adds instant style to your casual and professional fall and winter wardrobe.
pros: High marks for actually staying put without drooping throughout the day
Ideal for those on the move who desire a good-looking, fairly priced boot
A good fit for women of all shapes and sizes
cons: We love the added structure the drawstring provides
However, it may leave indents on your skin

customer_reviews.title: Love them! I'm 5'0 and it's just as high as I wanted them.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'0! I always have a hard time findin over the Knee High Boots because I'm so short and most of them are 26 high! These were about 21! Perfect! For the cost, I love this boot! Fit as expected! Holds onto your leg well! Comfortable and I actually like the strap! It has the stopper on it too. The boots packaging was very well! Each boot was inside plastic. Sometimes the strap will loosen but that's a given. Overall for about $40. This is a good pair of boots! Perfect for the weather!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kuan

customer_reviews.title: They're good
customer_reviews.text: Okay so these are definitely okay for the price. They are not comparable to brands like Steve Madden but they are nice and simple. I have big thighs so the adjustable straps help so that they are not to tight or loose. These boots are comfy but not the best quality for harsh weather or for activity like running or going for long walks. They are more like a fashiony for a casual outfit. I already got compliments at college and work. If your looking to save some money. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jess M

customer_reviews.title: I'm a size 9 and these in size 9 fit like a dream
customer_reviews.text: At last, an over the knee boot long enough for tall women (5'9" here) with normal calves. I'm a size 9 and these in size 9 fit like a dream. I have a hard time finding over the knee boots that fit my calves without slouching or looking bulky. These fit all the way up and look neat, not sloppy, and they are sexy. I got mine in the suede tan and get so many compliments I will be ordering the black. They are super comfortable to wear with a flatter, more functional heel. I walked for hours in these the first time I put them on and they felt like slippers. This is my favorite boot yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bevard

customer_reviews.title: Great for Larger Calves!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these boots! Exactly what I wanted! I wear a size 10 jeans, and have unusual sized calves, to big for standard calf boots but too skinny for "wide" calf boots. I was nervous they wouldn't fit but I took a chance and I am so happy I did! They fit my calves perfectly, they stay up pretty well, and they go about 4 inches above my knee with is exactly the height I wanted! Good quality too! If you have larger calves, don't worry, they have great stretch so they should fit great! I fount they were true to size, I wear a size 9 and purchased a size 9.
customer_reviews.author: Lennox Marie

customer_reviews.title: style boots
customer_reviews.text: I love boots and I have been trying to find olive green for a while, I came by these looking for something else. Of course I jumped on these. Of course I wore them right away as Michigan's weather is pretty cool right now. I cannot tell you the compliments I received on my olive green ensemble and where did I get the boots. Amazon of course. I am 5'7 and boots came above my knee. They fit so well, maybe because I have a narrow foot but I had on thick socks. I would still recommend them unless you have a very wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Theodora R Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let these fabulous boots pass you by!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new boots! They don’t look cheap, they fit very well which surprised me because I have thick calves and I’m 5’11 but these boots came all the way up and they are not tight at all. Definitely glad I purchased them!
customer_reviews.author: LaShonda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Long & lean
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, fit as expected and so cute! I have long slender legs and these boots fit me well. Might not be a good choice for wide calf
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I own!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I purchased them in black. I am 5'10 and them come just above my knee. I was concerned about size because I tend to be between an 8 1/2 and 9. I went with the 9 and they fit great. Can not wait to wear them. I think I will order a pair in brown also. They are a little loose if I wear them with a skirt but that is because I have really skinny legs. Over jeans wont be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Bitner

customer_reviews.title: these fit well and are comfortable. the only complaint i would have is that ...
customer_reviews.text: these fit well and are comfortable. the only complaint i would have is that where the zipper is on my left ankle, the zipper bumps out more than I'd like, maybe the boot was folded for a long time and the zipper warped or something. i wish there werent zippers at all, a similar pair of boots from this brand dont have zippers and they slide on fine. anyway, its not a total dealbreaker, love everything else about the boots!
customer_reviews.author: EERPS

customer_reviews.title: The color is perfect. Add a suede protector to ensure no water ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect. Add a suede protector to ensure no water damage. Height of boot is great. The drawstring works great but there is no structure to the boot at all and they slip a little while wearing. The drawstring helps with this but you are not able to keep the string really tight on your thigh because it will leave a mark. They're comfortable to wear all day. They fit my smaller calf great. They don't look too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Tall Enough for a 5'9 Girl
customer_reviews.text: These boots are a good value for the money paid. They arrived as pictured and described. The strings at the back are a little long, but overall don't take away from the look. I'm 5'9 and they went an inch or so above my knee, so I was happy with the height. I ended up returning the boots because they didn't seem like the best quality / that they would last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Hilariously Awful
customer_reviews.text: The boots I received did not look like the photos in the listing AT ALL. They are clunky and hideous, and if you can tell in the photo, they go all the way up to my hip (I’m 5’6”). These are so terrible that I don’t even think I’d keep them for an aging stripper costume for Halloween. What happened?? The images listed by the seller look so cute and different! I returned these as soon as I could.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Fun to wear!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 8.5 but they were just a little too small. Ok barefooted but not with a sock. had to order a 9. They look best over leggings/ skinny jeans, they don’t stay up on bare legs...could use an elastic topper/band. I really like them, they’re comfy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle Koglin

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these. Fit as expected (I ordered a size 10) and are comfortable to wear. The drawstring keeps them from sliding down. The material of the leg is very thin, compared to the structured foot, but it lays smoothly and looks very sexy once you get it on. However, I would say that if you have thick calves or thighs, this boot might not fit well in the leg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. I need more :)
customer_reviews.text: I got these in black faux suede in my usual size. Fits as expected and they look much more expensive than they were. I am 5'5 and they go about 4 inches over my knee. I love that look and the 'suede' is really soft. They have a back tie that you can tie tightly to keep them from slipping down. I am thinking of getting them in taupe next.
customer_reviews.author: flgardengirl

customer_reviews.title: The drawstring at the top makes it easy to adjust the tightness of the booth
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is small but I don't have skinny legs so I was nervous the leg part would be too tight. Nope! They fit perfectly. The drawstring at the top makes it easy to adjust the tightness of the booth. The height is adjustable so you can wear them as high as you want. The material is easy to clean with a towel and lint roller if needed. I have received a lot of compliments on them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday shoe
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the shoes, look like great quality for the price and I get so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Catherine Moore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome. I wish they weren’t sold out in black. I got them in green for my poison ivy costume. They worked perfectly. But now I want more ...
customer_reviews.author: El Tee

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! True to size, soft, fits well around the top knee. The only down side is the suede catches a lot of lint and dog hair. I'm always taking my lint roller to them.
customer_reviews.author: Riley R Vondra

customer_reviews.title: Funny sizing :(
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots but they fit funny. I originally ordered a size 9 and they were too snug, so I figured a 10 would be better, but, too large. Bummer that there's no half sizing. :(
customer_reviews.author: Giana

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Had these boots for over a year and I wear them when it’s super cold to bars and parties. I always get compliments. Will not regret!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Liandro

customer_reviews.title: The lack of padding will be an issue
customer_reviews.text: The boot needs more padding. Not made for a lot of walking. Made to wear, be cute and sit down
customer_reviews.author: Obie bellamy

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I really love these boots they are super cute I have been getting compliments for the last 2 weeks at work. They fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have small calves so these were much too slouchy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, great quality for the price. If you are on the fence about purchasing, don't be!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: beautiful comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: Thanks The Boots are Beautiful make sure you get one size larger but they are wonderful to wear Thank You
customer_reviews.author: centria wright

customer_reviews.title: but I do like the way they look
customer_reviews.text: They're a little cheaper, but I do like the way they look. Just don't look as classy as I'd like, but they're really not for that anyway...comfy and fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: KarrieBomb

customer_reviews.title: Awkward Calf bulge
customer_reviews.text: has an EXTREMELY awkward bulge in the calf area. Completely ruins them. Maybe if you had super thick calves (but then thin thighs) it might work?
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, cute style, only issue is they dont stay up well. They string tie loosens very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis K

customer_reviews.title: Go up a half size.
customer_reviews.text: Go up a half size. Otherwise great quality, love these!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected but its for people with skinny feet I have medium size feet not too wide but these fit tight on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit! True to size! Love them and would purchase again. They never sag!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Luongo

customer_reviews.title: Great value, runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price but they run small, unfortunately. I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Syrqa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in black last year and love them in tan. Comfortable and great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Roth

customer_reviews.title: LUV This Boot
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'8" and wear size 8 or 10 but I have skinny legs and with skinny jeans or leggings the fit is perfect. Boot height approximately 1" over knee. I usually wear a 81/2 to 9 (depending on the shoe) and I ordered a size 9 just-in-case... good thing fits perfect with thin socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are cute but I've been told they give the appeal of "stripper boots"
customer_reviews.text: Can walk in them fine but after a while my feet hurt in the toe area
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Delp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these, I get compliments everywhere I go. Comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: WMW

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I'm Plus Size (Fat) and they fit very good. Boots come up past knee.
customer_reviews.author: Big fine.510

customer_reviews.title: I love my boots
customer_reviews.text: I love my boots! Fit was good. I have small legs, so the drawstring was very handy. Fast shipment! Will do business again.
customer_reviews.author: F. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not best Quality. come down from your knee all the time.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Over the knee boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots come down as you walk. They do not stay up.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Run Small
customer_reviews.text: Love the style but this boot runs VERY SMALL. I wear a 10 and I will be returning them for a size 11.
customer_reviews.author: MNic

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these boots want another color in suede though
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boot!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I had a pair last year from a different brand that were $90 and I actually prefer these ones more!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pelczar

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots and great quality for the price. They were surprisingly comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sakia Ike

customer_reviews.title: I order this boots they are awesome. They coming after 2
customer_reviews.text: I order this boots they are awesome . They coming after 2 . days from ordering. Thank for that. I want to ordering more in future. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Laufey Sigridur Gunnarsdottir

customer_reviews.title: Not terribly tight up the leg as the picture makes it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not terribly tight up the leg as the picture makes it appear, they tend to sag even with the tie at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super cute. They fit my thick legs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kandiink

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! Wear them all the time and get a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: MadelineD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like them but they run a little small so had to send back for another half siize bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Legs

customer_reviews.title: But other then that I like them.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 10 which is my size but they fit a little tight. But other then that I like them.
customer_reviews.author: DenaBland

customer_reviews.title: nice!!
customer_reviews.text: delivered on time,I ordered wine color,looks not cheap,I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Heejin K.

customer_reviews.title: ... wearing these boots the zipper part broke off not happy at all about this
customer_reviews.text: after one hour of wearing these boots the zipper part broke off not happy at all about this
customer_reviews.author: Jill Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: More Inventory needed and a More Padded Footbed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 10 because there was no 9.5. I went back later to also order the size 9 to compare it but they were all taken so I had to return the 10 which was too big. A size 9.5 would have taken care of that issue but they don't carry half sizes. Also give us more padding in the foot bed but take away the big curve in the back.
customer_reviews.author: artsydancer

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Just yes.
customer_reviews.text: These are unbelievable. They are actually tall enough. I am 6ft and they go thigh high and actually stay up. I’m in love. 😍
customer_reviews.author: Gina N.

customer_reviews.title: ... wide and they stretch to fit plus they look great with leggings
customer_reviews.text: These boots are just what I was looking for because my cafe is wide and they stretch to fit plus they look great with leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah White

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots so very much! I wear a size 8 and they fit perfectly and look so good with black leggings. So comfortable and the material is fantastic. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Misty  Long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like how they are adjustable! They're so soft & really comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: The boots are very pretty and seem to be good quality, although I've only worn them once. They are a bit slouchier than I would like, but that isn't a fault of the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Davis

product_meta.title: Ollio Women's Shoes Faux Suede or Faux Leather Adjustable Drawstring Stretch Over Knee Zip Up Flat Long Boots TW8
product_meta.description: OLLIO is a well-established fashion shoe brand over 10 years which carries stylish and an affordable women's footwear. OLLIO offers the best quality at low price and confidently ensure the quality of our products. OLLIO carries a diverse and wide range selection of the latest trends and hottest a la mode fashion such as Boots, Military Style, Espadrilles, Flats, Lace-Ups, Loafers & Slip-Ons, Pumps, Sandals, High Heels, Platforms, Casuals, Dress Shoes, Oxfords, and many more. Search with "ollio" to see the full line of products.
